title: Baked eggs in avocado with pitta
description: Impress your friends or brunch date with baked eggs in avocado. They take no time at all and are super nutritious and delicious! Each serving provides 688kcal, 26g protein, 47g carbohydrate (of which 8g sugars), 41g fat (of which 9g saturates), 10g and 1.3g salt.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
